issue.title: Gazebo6 installation failing on Ubuntu 14.04 lts (trusty tahr) running on virtual box

content.raw:
Hi Jose,

Thanks for reply. I tried your solution but it didn't work for me.
It first complains for umet dependency. 
gazebo6: Depends: gazebo6-common (=6.1.0-1 trusty) but it is not going to be installed.
libgazebo6-dev: Depends : gazebo6-common (=6.1.0-1 trusty) but it is not going to be installed.
Again when I try to install gazedbo6-common it installs 6.1.0-2 trusty and I go back to my original issue.
I've attach screenshot of error.
My system config: Linux 3.13.0-62 generic #102 Ubuntu i686 (Ubuntu 14.04 lts trusty)
This is fresh installation of ubuntu on virtualbox. I've also upgraded packages (562) in first post.

Again when I try to install gazedbo6-common it installs 6.1.0-2 trusty and I go back to my original issue. I've attach screenshot of error.
